name: Escort (IndieCritic)
description:
This game was built for VimJam 2020, I ran out of time and missed the deadline but still wanted to share the game with everyone!

This game is a reverse bullet hell game, where instead of dodging the projectiles you must block as many as you can from hitting the mage you're escorting.

It's a very short game, around 10 minutes if you get the hang of it. Eventually I'll be adding more mechanics, including a shield bash to knock arrows away. The game will be ported and available on Mobile!

Follow me on Twitter for updates! ▶ https://twitter.com/IndieCriticShow
